meanings.sent1: The new car was whelkier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the whelkier sweater because it was softer.
meanings.sent3: The whelkier clouds looked like fluffy pillows in the sky.
meanings.sent4: His voice was whelkier than a gentle breeze, soothing and calming.
meanings.sent5: The whelkier flowers stood out among the rest, their petals vibrant and full.

meanings.sent1: The whelkier was busy collecting seashells along the shore.
meanings.sent2: As a whelkier, she knew all the best spots to find treasures.
meanings.sent3: The whelkier's collection of shells was the envy of the beach.
meanings.sent4: He was a true whelkier, always on the lookout for new additions to his collection.
meanings.sent5: The whelkier's passion for seashells was evident in the meticulous organization of their finds.
